overview:
As CFO, Steve is responsible for all aspects of finance and accounting at xAd. He is one of our most-active members, balancing his time among fundraising; coordinating contracts with vendors, partner and customers; developing business plans; and supporting all parts of the organization, from engineering and sales to business development and human resources.

Prior to xAd, Steve worked in the field of private equity, where he oversaw finance, accounting and operations for all fund-portfolio companies. During his tenure in private equity, Steve worked for such technology companies as Exigen Group (chief accounting officer), MySQL (vice president of finance), Vitria Technology (corporate controller), Exodus Communications (controller) and Centura Software/Gupta.

Even earlier, Steve was with KPMG Peat Marwick, where he earned his license as a certified public accountant. While there, he also supported companies ranging from early-stage to top-tier enterprises such as Apple, Adobe, Intuit and Siemens.
